descriptor.name: Shanaya Luxury Attar Perfume 12 ML
descriptor.short_desc:
A new range of luxurious-looking bottles that are filled with premium attar gives you a royal feeling.Â  100% Pure Premium Quality Non-Alcoholic AttarÂ 
This attar will also be a wonderful gifting option for your loved ones.
The enticing sweet fragrance of this attar is highly long lasting which is a vital feature to keep you on the go
Made using premium quality ingredients, this attar is absolutely safe for your skin
These attars ensure a long-lasting and rejuvenating fragrance

Attars come in a 12 ML (6+6 ml) & 20 ml pack
The quality of the container is high-class glass.
Use for all occasions external use only

AdilQadri attar now comes with highly taken care of oil, and a more promising fragrance than before which makes sense for applying on a daily basis.
